channel.title: Need help getting server online
channel.description:
ok so here are my questions i have a fully coded/working server and im having a shit ton of problems trying to get it online so users can use my client to connect to my server how can i edit my client to connect to my ip? will i have to edit my server any? how do i get my server online w/o fucking up my router i try portforwarding it and shit and it makes my net extremely slow i know im not doing something right PLEASE help one of my main concerns is getting my client change so that when users download it it will connect to my server
thanks ahead of time

item.title: Need help getting server online

item.description:
@rash wrote:

Client to your ip? - GUI, or client class.
Edit your server? - so people can connect? no
For the server online, you can use utorrent.
